title: SYMHC Classics: Night of the Long Knives
itunes:title: SYMHC Classics: Night of the Long Knives
description:
This 2017 episode covers several days in 1934 during which Adolf Hitler, who was at the time the Nazi Party Leader and Reich Chancellor, directed an action which eliminated all of his political enemies and enabled him to declare himself Fuhrer.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
